price: Yeroo Manicha (Ka’abaa) namootaaf iddoo deddeebiifi iddoo nagaa taasifnes [yaadadhaa], Maqaama Ibraahiim irraas iddoo salaataa taasifadhaa, (Nutis) Ibraahiimiifi Ismaa’iiliin mana Kiyya warra isa irra naanna’aniif, warra keessa taa’aniifi warra (isa keessatti) rukuu’aafi sujuuda godhaniif qulqulleessaa jechuun waadaa seensifne.
arabic: وَإِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَمۡنٗا وَٱتَّخِذُواْ مِن مَّقَامِ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ مُصَلّٗىۖ وَعَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ أَن طَهِّرَا بَيۡتِيَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلۡعَٰكِفِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh jaʿalnā al-bayta mathābatan lilnnāsi wa-amnan wa-ittakhidhū min maqāmi ib'rāhīma muṣallan waʿahid'nā ilā ib'rāhīma wa-is'māʿīla an ṭahhirā baytiya lilṭṭāifīna wal-ʿākifīna wal-rukaʿi al-sujūdi
translations: and those who seclude themselves for devotion and prayer
